Name: In't Aepjen
Review Text: I love that bar. Amazing beer, noisy and crowdy at weekend. But nice to stay.

Name: In't Aepjen
Review Text: This is a solid bar. Wooden interiors, almost rotting with age.. Their house beer is super duper awesome, and the hosts are nice. Go there and get their house beer for sure. The ambiance and just the fact people have been sitting there for centuries makes you feel special

Name: In't Aepjen
Review Text:
We had great time and beer at this place! :)
Cozy, warm, friendly people and staff, just what we needed.
Will definitely come back again!

Name: In't Aepjen
Review Text: The atmosphere and history of the bar are very cool. Great place to sit and relax and enjoy a beer. The barman was very nice and let us squeeze in a beer right before closing.

Name: In't Aepjen
Review Text: I like this place very much. Especially atmosphere inside. It is cosy and nice. Almost darkness, monkeys in cage, small tables, little bit dust and crowd - it all makes you feel like in a very old traditional pub. The you can find here a good variety of beers.

Name: In't Aepjen
Review Text: A great place with plenty of history behind it. Good beer selection and a very nice and competent barman. Although the place could seem quite like a tourist attraction, it's actually very authentic and packed with the locals. Absolutely loved it <3

Name: In't Aepjen
Review Text: Lovely little bar, feels very local even so its in a super touristy area. Good motivation learn more dutch to talk to the people around and don't feel so foreign. Loved it so!

Name: In't Aepjen
Review Text: Great history at this place. Supposedly, in it's heydey, sailors used to pay for lodgings in monkeys, rather than money. Eventually the pub got so overrun with monkeys that they had to be sold off to a regular visitor (and that guy's garden …

Name: In't Aepjen
Review Text: Cozy bar with old-world charm. Excellent selection of Belgian beer. It's always busy so need some patience if you want a table.

Name: In't Aepjen
Review Text: Nice cozy spot for a beer :)

Name: In't Aepjen
Review Text: A fantastic little bar (brown cafe) in one of the oldest wooden buildings in Amsterdam. Small and relaxed, and full of quirky decorations (monkeys used to be brought in here by sailors back from the travels). A great selection of really …

Name: In't Aepjen
Review Text: Very rude staffl, we sat down on the terrace with our phone on a selfie stick, Immediatly a guy came out to say: we are not going to do this: LEAVE. Not a word more, no discussion possible... we were perplex, it was so rude and unprofessional

Name: In't Aepjen
Review Text: Bustling bar. Historic place decorated throughout with monkeys. Monkeys were apparently used here as currency back in history. Great beer selection.

Name: In't Aepjen
Review Text: Enjoyed the house brew at this bar that was established in 1519.  This is not a fancy bar. Gilded trim and wall portraits still adorn the space. Memorabilia from centuries long gone set the scene. Authentic Amaterdam A.F.  Check it out.

Name: In't Aepjen
Review Text: Cozy bar, small though typical Dutch bar, close to central station

Name: In't Aepjen
Review Text: Great music in this cozy little bar. Good selection of beers. Looks to be an old bar renovated in contemporary style of an old bar. Chilled spot, good crowd

Name: In't Aepjen
Review Text:
Fabulous little bar dating back to 1490.
Such an amazing place to drink the flavorful locally produced beer.

Name: In't Aepjen
Review Text: Good tradition Dutch bar in one of the historic streets in Amsterdam

Name: In't Aepjen
Review Text: Quite small place but with nice atmosphare and good beer.

Name: In't Aepjen
Review Text: This pub has great character and is the oldest in the city. Wooden interior and exterior makes it extremely unique. Watch out for the beer it is very good and you might stay a little longer than you expected.

Name: In't Aepjen
Review Text: Nice bar for a few quiet drinks. Very friendly bar staff. They will even give you a bar cloth to use as a makeshift pillow if you (or your friends) need a snooze after 2 bottles of Duvel

Name: In't Aepjen
Review Text: Friendly service and nice bar.

Name: In't Aepjen
Review Text: Best beer café in Amsterdam! You must try their own beer ! Awesome

Name: In't Aepjen
Review Text: Great place to live and drink

Name: In't Aepjen
Review Text: Beautiful old brown pub at the Zeedijk. One of the oldest pubs in the City. Around the corner of the red light district. Nice beers and genevers. Good service.

Name: In't Aepjen
Review Text: This very old pub has a cozy atmosphere and a friendly bartender.  I enjoyed my time relaxing here with a glass of vieux.

Name: In't Aepjen
Review Text: Great place, shame we didn’t have a monkey 🐒!

Name: In't Aepjen
Review Text: Small Unique bar in Amsterdam center with many special craft beers. Mostly elderly people audience.

Name: In't Aepjen
Review Text: Great mostly Belgian beer in a genuinely historical context. The apes are stuffed these days but they didn't used to be.

Name: In't Aepjen
Review Text: Cool history. Nice staff, friendly vibe, solid beers. Definitely recommend!

Name: In't Aepjen
Review Text: Visited here in 2017. Nice drinks. Great atmosphere.

Name: In't Aepjen
Review Text: Fun little bar that is near the redlight district. It has been around for a long time and in the old days salors would come in with their monkeys. That's where the decorations come from.

Name: In't Aepjen
Review Text: Cool old little bar. One of the few wood buildings left in town. Have a monkey beer and a smile!

Name: In't Aepjen
Review Text: Get ready to be publicly shamed if you get something "not craft" enough. Why do you have those beers on tap anyway? Very unprofessional

Name: In't Aepjen
Review Text: If you can find a seat, stay! The loos are an assault course but add to the charm of this Amsterdam legend.
